eventutils.updatechecker.new: There is a new update available!
eventutils.updatechecker.config: You can disable this message in the config
eventutils.command.teleport: Teleports to the last posted event of that type
eventutils.confirm_exit.title: Confirm Exit
eventutils.confirm_exit.message: Are you sure you want to exit the game?
eventutils.confirm_disconnect.title: Confirm Disconnect
eventutils.confirm_disconnect.message: Are you sure you want to disconnect?
eventutils.config.title: EventUtils Mod Config
eventutils.config.event_description: Whether you should be pinged for {event}.
eventutils.config.teleport.title: Auto Teleport
eventutils.config.teleport.description: Automatically teleports you to the server when an event starts
eventutils.config.queue.title: Simple Queue Message
eventutils.config.queue.description: Simplifies the queue message for InvadedLands
eventutils.config.discord.title: Discord RPC
eventutils.config.discord.description: Whether the Discord rich presence should be shown
eventutils.config.update.title: Mod Update Checker
eventutils.config.update.description: Whether the mod should check and notify for updates
eventutils.config.window.title: Confirm Window Close
eventutils.config.window.description: Whether a confirmation should pop up confirming you want to close your game window
eventutils.config.disconnect.title: Confirm Disconnect
eventutils.config.disconnect.description: Whether a confirmation should pop up confirming you want to leave your server
eventutils.config.famous.title: Default Famous IP
eventutils.config.famous.description: The default ip for if a [potential] famous event is pinged with no ip inputted
eventutils.config.entity.title: Hidden Entity Types
eventutils.config.entity.description: The types of entities that will be hidden
eventutils.config.players.title: Whitelisted Players
eventutils.config.players.description: The names of the players you can see when players are hidden
eventutils.config.hideriders.title: Hide Riders/Passengers
eventutils.config.hideriders.description: Whether the passengers and vehicles of the hidden entity should be hidden as well.
